issues.title: H1 size mismatch between documentation and implementation
issues.description: DESIGN_SYSTEM.md documents Display-lg as 3.5rem (56px), but typography.css defines --h1-size as 2rem (32px)
issues.impact: Potential confusion about heading size standards
issues.recommendation: Clarify whether H1 should be 32px or 56px. Update documentation or CSS accordingly.

issues.title: Undocumented H3 size in design system

issues.impact: Incomplete specification documentation
issues.recommendation: Add H3/Headline-sm size to DESIGN_SYSTEM.md typography scale

issues.title: H1 line-height discrepancy

issues.recommendation: Align line-height value to 1.1 or update documentation to 1.2
